entry.title: Frontend Strategies for SAP Sales Cloud V2: An Architect’s Perspective on Modern UI Extensions
entry.content:
Introduction

As an SAP architect, I’m sharing my perspective on choosing the right frontend technologies and design strategies for SAP Sales Cloud V2. Selecting the appropriate frontend is not just about framework preference—it impacts user experience, integration, maintainability, performance, scalability, and adherence to SAP’s design principles.

While SAP Fiori provides a standardized and proven design framework, Sales Cloud V2 introduces a modern, non-Fiori-based UI. In this article, I’ll provide guidance on balancing Fiori compliance, lightweight frontend frameworks like React, seamless backend integration, performance, and scalability, along with best practices for extensions, mashups, and side-by-side scenarios with S/4HANA.

Understanding SAP Sales Cloud V2's UI

SAP Sales Cloud V2 introduces a modern, intuitive UI designed to enhance user experience and productivity. Unlike traditional SAP Fiori applications, V2's UI is not strictly Fiori-based. It leverages contemporary design principles to provide a seamless and engaging user interface.

For a visual overview of SAP Sales Cloud V2 UI.

 

Frontend Development Considerations

1. Aligning with SAP Fiori Design Principles

SAP Fiori offers a set of design principles aimed at creating consistent and user-friendly interfaces. While V2's UI is not Fiori-based, developers can still adhere to Fiori's design guidelines to ensure a cohesive user experience. Key considerations include:

  • Consistency: Maintaining uniform design elements across applications.
  • Efficiency: Optimizing workflows to reduce user effort.
  • Intuitiveness: Designing interfaces that are easy to understand and navigate.
  • Performance: Ensuring fast rendering and responsiveness.
  • Scalability: Designing the frontend to handle growing user loads and data volumes efficiently.

2. Choosing the Right Frontend Technology

The choice of frontend technology should align with the application's requirements and the desired user experience. Consider:

  • Fiori Elements (CAP / UI5): Ideal for OData-based applications requiring standardized Fiori UI patterns. Leveraging SAP BTP CAP best practices, Fiori Elements provide:
    • Metadata-driven UI generation (List Report, Object Page, Analytical List Page)
    • Out-of-the-box CRUD operations
    • Automatic audit log and change history of business object tracking.In CAP, with simple annotations and minimal effort, audit logging tracks user and system actions for compliance, while change history tracking records the actual data changes in business objects — capturing before and after field values for complete business transparency.
    • Attachment management support
    • Event-driven integration through SAP Event Mesh
    • Extensibility for custom fields and actions
    • Built-in navigation, filtering, and sorting features
    • Validations and field-level rules defined in CDS models are automatically enforced, ensuring consistent data integrity across UI and backend.
    • Support for multitenancy, authentication, and authorization using SAP BTP XSUAA.
    • Integration with OData v4, REST, and messaging-based endpoints.
    • Note: If Fiori Elements annotations do not fully meet business requirements, teams should agree with business stakeholders to address those scenarios using custom UI extensions. This is not a limitation of CAP or Fiori Elements but reflects a custom requirement beyond the framework’s standardized scope.
  • UI5 Web Components for React: Use Fiori-compliant components within a React app to combine flexibility with consistency.
    Documentation
  • React with Custom Components: For applications requiring highly customized UI aligned with Sales Cloud V2 look & feel.
  • UI5 Freestyle (SAPUI5): For deep integration with SAP backend and traditional Fiori look & feel.

When to Choose Fiori Elements for Sales Cloud V2

  • Backend services are OData-based
  • Standard UI patterns like List Report, Object Page, or Analytical List Page meet requirements
  • Minimal custom UI is needed
  • Out-of-the-box features (CRUD, attachments, audit/change history) are beneficial
  • Strict adherence to Fiori design guidelines is required
  • Faster delivery and lower TCO is a priority
  • Extensibility for custom fields and actions is needed

Balancing Look & Feel vs Out-of-the-Box Fiori

When integrating with backend services, consider:

  • Use Fiori Elements: When OData backend, standard UI patterns suffice, and business prioritizes rapid delivery, TCO, and built-in CAP features.
  • Use Custom / Lightweight Frontend: When business requires UI to match Sales Cloud V2 look & feel, heavy customization, or mashups.
  • Hybrid Approach: Combine CAP Fiori Elements for standard functionality with custom/lightweight frontends for specialized UI requirements.

Backend Integration Considerations

  • OData Services: Standard SAP protocol for frontend-backend communication
  • GraphQL: Flexible alternative to OData
  • REST APIs: For external service integration

Choose the backend service type that aligns with your frontend framework to ensure seamless integration, optimal performance, and scalability.

Extensions, Mashups, and SAP Build Apps

SAP Sales Cloud V2 supports extensions and mashups to enhance functionality:

  • Sales Cloud Extensions: Built on SAP BTP to extend V2 capabilities
  • Mashups: Embed external apps or services into Sales Cloud interface

Mashup-Based HTML UI

  • Work List: Mashup as work center feature
  • Detail View: Display detailed info in context
  • Quick View: Summarized data for fast access

Extensibility Using SAP Build Apps

SAP Build Apps enables no-code/low-code apps for all form factors. Extensions can be embedded in Sales Cloud V2.

  • Included for tenants with 100+ users
  • Additional licensing required for fewer than 100 users

References for Mashups and SAP Build Apps

  • SAP Sales Cloud Version 2 Solution Guide (PDF)
  • SAP Build Apps Setup Guide for Sales Cloud V2
  • Design and Develop Extensions using SAP AppGyver

Recommendations

  • Use Fiori Elements (CAP/UI5) for OData-based apps with standard UI patterns and built-in features (CRUD, attachments, audit)
  • Use React / custom frontend to match Sales Cloud V2 look & feel when business requires visual consistency or heavy customization
  • Use UI5 Freestyle for deep SAP backend integration and traditional Fiori UX
  • Consider hybrid approaches combining Fiori Elements and custom/lightweight frontends
  • Extensions and mashups should prioritize performance, consistency, security
  • Side-by-side scenarios with S/4HANA: maintain SAP UI5 for OData backend integration
  • Backend service type (OData, REST, GraphQL) influences frontend choice and integration approach

References

  • SAP Sales Cloud Version 2 Overview
  • UI5 Web Components for React Documentation
  • Comparison Between SAPUI5 and Web Components
  • SAP Sales Cloud V2 Features and Roadmap
  • SAP Sales Cloud V2 with S/4HANA in Action
  • SAP Sales Cloud V2 Solution Guide (PDF)
  • SAP Build Apps Setup Guide for Sales Cloud V2
  • Design and Develop Extensions using SAP AppGyver

Key Takeaways

  • Choosing the frontend technology for SAP Sales Cloud V2 requires balancing look & feel, performance, scalability, and integration capabilities.
  • For Fiori-compliant UI, Fiori Elements (CAP/UI5) or UI5 Freestyle are preferred for OData-based apps.
  • For customized, lightweight UI aligned with Sales Cloud V2, use React or other modern frameworks.
  • CAP Fiori Elements provide out-of-the-box advantages: CRUD, attachments, audit/change history, navigation, filtering, and extensibility.
  • Hybrid approaches can combine standard Fiori Elements with custom frontends for specialized UX needs.
  • Backend service type (OData, REST, GraphQL) influences frontend technology choice.
  • Extensions and mashups should prioritize consistency, performance, and security.
  • Side-by-side scenarios (Sales Cloud V2 & S/4HANA) benefit from using SAP UI5 technologies for OData backend integration.

entry.title: Activate Joule Studio in 5 Simple Steps
entry.content:
Joule Studio is a capability in SAP Build that allows organizations to create and deploy custom Joule agents and skills that automate workflows and improve efficiency across SAP and non-SAP systems. Currently the Agent Builder offering is in Beta and the Skill Builder  offering is generally available. In this blog, we will focus on activation of the Skill Builder in Joule which is now Generally Available.

Stay updated on the latest Business AI services and activation guides by following the SAP Business AI Onboarding Resource Center

The key pre-requisites to activate Skill Builder with Joule Studio are as follows:-
Access to BTP Global Account with the following entitlements available via Subscription, BTPEA, CPEA or PAYG model

  • SAP Build Process Automation, build-default (Application) plan
  • Joule, foundation (Application)/ standard (Application) plan
  • Active instance of SAP Cloud Identity Services for Identity Authentication and Identity Provisioning  

Read more about the service and pre-requisites in these following blogs from our product leaders and managers:

  • Joule Studio is generally available in SAP Build: Empower your business with intelligent automation
  • Build, Deploy, and Extend AI Agents with Joule Studio
  • How to Get Started with Joule Studio

Activating Joule Studio - Skill Builder in 5 Simple Steps

Here is a quick hit video capturing the steps documented below:

 

Onto the Joule. Studio- Skill Builder Activation!

Step 1 - Create a BTP Subaccount and Assign the Entitlements:

Create a subaccount in your BTP Global Account and select region where both Joule, foundation/ standard and Build Process Automation, build-default plans are available. Find the list of regions supported for Joule service at this SAP Help Portal link and Build Process Automation Service at this SAP Help Portal link.

  • Click on Create button on BTP Global Account landing page and select Subaccount option

  • Enter the relevant details including selecting the suitable region and click on Create button

Enable Cloud Foundry Environment

  • Click on Enable Cloud Foundry button on the subaccount landing page

  • Update the details in the window and click on Create button

Create Space in the Cloud Foundry Environment

  • Select the Create Space button that appears after the Cloud Foundry Environment is created

  • Select the relevant roles and click on the Create button

Add Joule and  Build Process Automation entitlements

  • Navigate to Entitlements section from subaccount landing page
  • Click on Edit button

  • Select Add Service Plans button

 

  • Search for Joule in the search bar and select the foundation (Application) plan of the Joule service 

  • Next, search for build process in the search bar and select the build-default (Application) plan from SAP Build Process Automation service
  • Click on  Add 2 Service Plans button to add the entitlements to the relevant subaccount

  • Click on Save button on the Entitlements page

Step 2- Complete Trust Configuration and Activate Build Process Automation (Subaccount):

Create a Trust Configuration to add authentication for application users in the IAS tenant on BTP

  • Navigate to Security > Trust Configuration section under your BTP subaccount
  • Click on Establish Trust button

  • Select the suitable IAS tenant and click on Next button

  • Choose the domain consistent with your BTP account and non-BTP applications and click on the Next button

  • Review and update the relevant parameters in this screen and click on Next button

  • Review the details and click on Finish button

Enable the Build Process Automation Service, build-default plan

  • Navigate to Instances and Subscriptions section under your BTP subaccount and click on Create button

  • Select the SAP Build Process Automation service and build-default plan and click on Create button

  • The service will be created as seen under Subscriptions

Step 3 - Run Joule Booster to Activate Joule Studio Capability Package (Global Account):

Activate Joule Studio Capability Package on SAP Build Process Automation

  • Navigate to your BTP Global Account and select the Boosters section
    • Search for Joule in the search bar and select the Setting Up Joule booster tile

  • Click on Start button

  • After the prerequisites are checked and required entitlements are met, click on Next button 

  • Select the Joule (das-application) plan and the subaccount where Build Process Automation service is activated and click on Next button

  • After selecting the products to be integrated on the following screen and selecting relevant system type option click on Next button. Review Integrating Joule with SAP Solutions help document for more details on pre-requisites for integration with the relevant SAP systems in your organization

  • Select the SAP Build Process Automation option from the Capability Packages dropdown, click on Next button

  • Review the Formation Name and select the correct service instance number - URL from the SAP Build Process Automation System dropdown then click on the Next button

  • Review the details on the final page of the booster and click on Finish button

  • After processing, the Success window appears, click on the Close button after reviewing status

Step 4 - Create Role Collection and Assign Users (Subaccount):

Create Role Collection and assign the role collection the relevant users

  • Navigate to the Subaccount where the Build Process Automation service is installed and navigate to the Role Collections section and click on Create button; Enter the relevant details and click on Create button

  • Select the recently created role collection line item from the list and click on Edit button

  • Select search help option in first empty line item under Roles

  • Enter the search text "das" Application Identifier dropdown, select the right option from the list and select the end_user and extensibility_developer roles from the list below. Click on Add button after selecting the roles

  • Click the Save button for the role collection we created

  • Navigate to Users option under the Security section of the subaccount and click Create button

  • Select the Identity Provider for which the trust configuration was added, add the user details and click on Create button

  • Click on the new user created in the table, navigate to Role Collections section, click on the options(...) and select Assign Role Collections option

  • Select the role collection created in the previous step from the list along with Build Process Automation roles and any other relevant roles and click on the Assign Role Collection button

  • Navigate to Instances and Subscriptions and select the SAP Build Process Automation instance

  • Click on Create after the Build Lobby loads

  • The Joule Skill option should now be available for you to create custom Joule Skills

Step 5 - Build Your First Custom Joule Skill:

Follow the Build custom Joule skills for SAP and non-SAP systems using Joule Studio mission to get started with building your custom skills on Joule Studio.

Congratulations, you are all set to start building Custom Skills with the Skill Builder on Joule Studio!

entry.title: SAP集成套件概况介绍
entry.content:
如果您对BTP感兴趣，BTP个人精选内容目录 | SAP Blogs 可能有更多你需要的内容

 

想象一下：您的客户每次下单都需要频繁的邮件或电话往来，但订单信息需要手动录入ERP系统；销售团队在CRM中录入了一笔新订单，但仓库管理系统毫不知情，依然显示库存充足；财务部门每月花费数天时间在不同系统间复制粘贴数据

如果这些场景让您感到熟悉，那么接下来的5分钟阅读将为您节省数万小时的重复劳动。

在数字化时代，企业平均使用187个不同的应用程序，但其中只有29%能够实现有效集成。这意味着什么？意味着您的团队每天都在做"数字苦力"——在各个系统间搬运数据，而不是专注于创造价值。

 

SAP集成套件是什么？

SAP集成套件（SAP Integration Suite）是SAP推出的云原生集成平台，诞生于2020年，作为SAP BTP集成能力域的核心组件，专门解决企业应用集成的挑战。它在SAP产品矩阵中定位为企业IT架构的"连接器"，专门解决企业内外部系统之间的数据和流程对接问题

 

SAP开发集成套件的目的是什么？

战略层面：将企业IT架构打造成一个实时互联互通的整体，为各个组件提供实时数据，提高数据质量，进而通过分析，AI等手段释放数据的价值

技术层面：提供一站式的集成解决方案，无需组合多种技术：集成套件既提供传统的总线，API管理和EDI集成技术，又提供下一代基于事件驱动的集成技术

 

 

SAP集成套件由什么组成，可以用来干什么？

集成套件的功能主要包括云集成、API管理、B2B集成，事件驱动集成这四块。

可以集成不同接口协议，不同数据格式，不同网络环境的应用；可以对接外部系统；可以管理内部API；还可以利用事件驱动完成实时集成。

集成套件基于云原生架构设计，可以自动根据需求调节资源，保证性能稳定

为应对异构网络环境，配备了云连接器(SAP Cloud Connector)以实现云与内网的安全对接，以及实现内网到内网集成的边缘集成组件(Edge Integration Cell)

 

 

集成套件和市面上常见的类似产品有什么区别？

1. 更加针对业务的服务设计：

集成套件的服务都是针对企业场景设计的。就像定制西装比成衣更合身一样，大部分工具都针对企业IT需求，还包含了大量预定义的集成流、B2B映射模板等，让企业能够快速启动集成项目

2. 基于BTP的平台效应：

集成套件充分利用SAP BTP的统一身份认证、安全管理等平台服务 。

3. 与SAP生态的完美结合：

  • 内置RFC、IDoc、BAPI等SAP专有协议以及所有主流协议的支持
  • 预置了数百个SAP应用的连接器和集成模板
  • 与SAP业务应用的事件机制天然集成

 

 

SAP集成套件该怎么用呢？

对于不同规模的企业，集成套件的应用场景各有侧重：

中小型企业：可以采用集成套件作为企业服务总线，统一管理所有系统间的数据交换，建立标准化的集成治理体系。

大型企业：面临多云、混合云的复杂架构：

  • 可以进一步利用API管理功能，通过统一的API网关管理数百个服务接口
  • 可以进一步利用B2B功能，和上下游企业对接，无需邮件/电话即可实时获取供给/需求的状态
  • 可以利用事件驱动能力，将S/4HANA为代表的SAP应用作为事件源，无需代码开发，仅配置就可以实现真正的完全实时集成, 任何新的变化都可以让其他系统最快获知，进而赋予业务部门竞争优势（而不是通过定时任务或短时间轮询达成的假实时）

entry.title: SAP Build 拓展套件概况介绍
entry.content:
如果您对BTP感兴趣，BTP个人精选内容目录 | SAP Blogs 可能有更多你需要的内容

 

SAP Build是什么，它从何而来？

SAP Build是基于BTP的拓展平台，它在SAP产品矩阵中定位为企业数字化转型的"加速器"，专门帮助企业快速构建应用程序、自动化流程和创建数字化工作空间，无需编写复杂代码。

同时，由于SAP近来推行的清洁核心Clean Core战略 ，该平台也变得越来越重要，将作为承载定制化需求的创新平台，来为保持标准化的应用保驾护航。

 

SAP开发Build的目的是什么？

战略层面：

SAP发现做了大量定制化开发的系统难以更新升级，也就难以采用新技术，例如SAP开发好的嵌入式AI功能，而只有令应用相对标准化才能帮助企业持续采用新技术，跟上AI时代的发展步。

但企业的定制化需求永远存在，所以SAP开发了基于开源技术的SAP Build平台，在应用体外承接定制化需求

功能层面：

1. 降低开发门槛：

传统的应用开发方式需要大量编程知识和技术专长，开发周期长、成本高。SAP Build通过提供直观的拖拽式界面、预构建模板和简化的开发工具，让业务用户也能快速创建企业级应用

2. 充分释放SAP生态系统价值：

SAP Build是针对SAP应用和企业需求所设计的，天然集成SAP应用，还提供预构建的连接器和集成模板，帮助企业更好地扩展现有SAP投资

 

 

SAP Build由什么组成，可以用来干什么？

SAP Build主要包含四个核心组件，形成完整的开发生态系统：

  • SAP Build Apps：低代码应用开发平台，通过拖拽方式快速开发前后端和数据结构，更是可以一次开发，多次部署成Web和移动应用，无需深度编程知识 。
  • SAP Build Code：专业代码开发环境，集成了生成式AI助手Joule，适合专业开发人员使用。
  • SAP Build Process Automation：流程自动化工具，拖拉拽即可开发RPA和工作流，帮助企业提高运营效率。
  • SAP Build Work Zone：低代码的门户平台，为员工、合作伙伴和客户提供统一的应用入口。

典型组合工作场景： 想象一个制造企业需要处理设备维护申请。业务用户可以使用Build Apps创建一个移动应用让现场工人提交维护请求，通过Process Automation自动路由审批流程并触发工单创建，最后在Work Zone中为管理层提供统一的维护状态仪表板，整个过程就像流水线一样自动化运行

 

SAP Build和市面上常见的类似产品有什么区别？

1. 更加针对业务的服务设计：

与通用低代码平台不同，SAP Build的服务都是针对企业业务场景设计的。就像定制西装比成衣更合身一样，大部分工具都包含开箱即用的预定义内容，比如预构建的业务流程模板、行业特定的应用模板等，让企业能够快速启动项目

2. 基于BTP的平台效应：

SAP Build充分利用SAP BTP的统一身份认证、数据管理等平台服务。各个组件之间可以无缝协作，例如BTP上开发的应用既可以借助集成套件接入整体IT架构，又可以利用数据与分析能力释放其数据的价值

3. 与SAP生态的完美结合：

SAP Build深度集成了SAP应用的业务逻辑和数据模型。例如，它原生支持SAP S/4HANA的数据结构、SuccessFactors的人力资源流程等，就像为SAP系统量身定制的"专用工具箱"

 

SAP Build该怎么落地使用呢？

SAP Build作为全面的开发平台，对不同的场景都提供了灵活的开发方式：

  • 对于流程自动化方面的需求，可以通过Process Automation自动化/数字化运营流程，如发票处理、审批流程等，显著提升运营效率
  • 对于用户单一入口的需求：可以使用Work Zone创建统一的数字工作空间，整合各类业务应用和信息资源
  • 对于应用开发类的需求：对于相对简单，上线要求紧张的需求，可以使用Build Apps通过拖拉拽快速开发；对于复杂的需求，可以使用SAP Build Code借助生成式AI的能力生成代码，快速构建复杂的全栈应用

但最关键的还是在应用开发部分，所有SAP应用的定制开发需求最后都会流向SAP Build这个产品，也就是代表着，标准的核心保持标准，敏捷的平台快速迭代。

entry.title: SAP Business Data Cloud业务数据云概况介绍
entry.content:
如果您对BTP感兴趣，BTP个人精选内容目录 | SAP Blogs 可能有更多你需要的内容

 

你是否正在经历这些痛苦时刻？

每月月末，财务部门催促你提交各种经营分析报表，而你却要花费整整一周时间，从不同系统导出Excel，手工整理数据，反复核对数字...

当老板在会议上问起"我们的库存周转率趋势如何？"时，你只能尴尬地回答"需要几天时间统计一下"...

IT部门告诉你，开发一个新的数据仪表板需要3个月时间和大量预算，而你缺马上就需要做出业务决定...

如果你是SAP用户，这些场景一定似曾相识。

作为企业的业务负责人、IT管理者或数据分析师，你每天都在与数据打交道，但传统的数据处理方式让你深陷"有数据、无洞察"的困境。你知道SAP系统里储存着企业运营的"金矿"，但挖掘这些价值却需要付出巨大的时间和人力成本。

现在，是时候改变这一切了。

SAP BDC（Business Data Cloud）业务技术云的出现，正是为了解决你面临的这些核心痛点。它不仅仅是又一个技术产品，而是专门为像你这样的SAP用户量身打造的"数据解放方案"。

想象一下：

✅ 一键启动，无需人工干预就能看到实时的财务分析报表
✅ 不懂技术？没关系，预置的智能应用让你"开箱即用"
✅ 有特殊需求？完全支持个性化定制，且不会浪费既有的BW投资
这不是科幻小说，而是SAP BDC已经实现的现实。在接下来的文章中，我将为你详细展示这个"数据魔法师"如何将你从繁重的数据工作中解放出来，让你真正专注于业务洞察和决策制定。

继续阅读，你将了解到SAP BDC如何成为你数据管理路上最得力的助手。

 

SAP Business Data Cloud是什么，它从何而来？

SAP Business Data Cloud (BDC)是SAP推出的统一数据管理和分析平台，基于SAP Business Technology Platform构建，提供数据统一和分析能力。定位是SAP在数据驱动时代的核心数据平台，基于云原生架构打造，融入了SAP在企业数据管理和业务洞察领域的深厚积累。

 

SAP开发Business Data Cloud的目的是什么？

1. 为客户提供统一的数据平台：

BDC提供了功能全面的一站式解决方案，帮助客户减少架构设计和实施的成本，可以快速获取完整的数据能力。

2. 帮助客户降低SAP数据的使用成本：

BDC通过预构建的数据集成，存储，建模，可视化内容，自动化处理数据提取、转换和发布，让企业能够快速获得可信赖的、分析就绪的数据，用户只需要挑选并点击启用报表，系统就会自动完成所有配置工作，为用户快速提供基于实时数据的报表

3.帮助SAP老客户快速应用最新技术：

BDC通过BW PCE组件来帮助SAP老客户保留过去的投资，同时以最小的颠覆性提供使用新技术例如Databricks的方式，

 

SAP Business Data Cloud由什么组成，可以用来干什么？

BDC为企业提供完整的数据管理和分析能力，主要包括数据集成与治理、数据存储与建模、数据分析与可视化、AI与机器学习四大核心能力。

BDC基于云原生SaaS架构设计，包含以下核心组件：

  • BDC Cockpit：统一管理界面，用于配置数据管道、管理用户访问和监控系统状态
  • SAP Datasphere：提供数据集成，存储，建模能力
  • SAP Analytics Cloud：提供分析和可视化功能
  • SAP Databricks：提供高级数据工程和机器学习能力
  • SAP BW PCE：保留企业过去对BW的投资，并应用到最新技术

BDC有两种用法：

一种是基于Intelligent Application智能应用(即预置SaaS报表）的快速启动方式：通过BDC Cockpit选择并启用SaaS报表后，系统就会自动从SAP S/4HANA等源系统提取数据，在Datasphere中创建数据模型，然后在SAP Analytics Cloud中生成实时数据的报表, 这个一键获取的实时报表（背后是数据管道，模型，可视化的组合）就叫做Intelligent Application智能应用

一种是自定义方式：从数据集成，数据存储，数据建模到数据展示，BDC支持全部组件的定制开发，用户可以根据自己的需求从零开始开发，当然也可以复制一份标准内容之后再进行定制化修改

 

SAP Business Data Cloud和市面上常见的类似产品有什么区别？

1. 开箱即用的标准SaaS报表： 与通用数据平台不同，BDC提供开箱即用的SaaS形式的报表，专门针对SAP业务场景设计。企业无需从零开始构，可以直接使用标准化的成品报表，大幅缩短实施周期；这套报表背后的内容也都是可复用的，低成本即可定制化

2. 基于BTP的平台效应： BDC充分利用SAP BTP的统一身份认证、安全管理和监控能力，各个组件之间可以无缝协作。数据在不同组件间流转时保持一致性和安全性，避免了传统多厂商集成的复杂性。

3. 与SAP生态的深度集成： BDC原生支持SAP应用的数据模型和业务逻辑，包括对S/4HANA、SuccessFactors、Ariba等SAP应用的深度集成。同时支持第三方数据源，通过统一的数据模型实现跨系统的数据一致性。

 

SAP Business Data Cloud该怎么用呢？

对于不同数据成熟度的企业，BDC的应用重点各有不同：

数据起步阶段的企业： 可以从SaaS形式的报表开始，快速获得业务洞察。例如使用People Intelligence应用分析人力资源数据，或使用S/4HANA数据包分析财务和运营数据。

数据整合阶段的企业： 可以重点利用BDC的数据集成能力，将分散在各个系统中的数据统一到Datasphere中，建立企业级的数据仓库和数据湖架构。

数据驱动阶段的企业： 可以充分利用BDC的高级分析能力：

  • 通过Databricks进行复杂的机器学习和AI分析，预测业务趋势
  • 利用跨系统的统一数据模型，实现真正的端到端业务洞察
  • 在复杂的多云、混合云环境中提供一致的数据体验，让业务决策始终基于最新、最准确的数据（而不是依赖传统的批处理或手工报表方式）

entry.title: Reimagining Logistics for the Cloud Era — Inside SAP Logistics Management
entry.content:
Many small and mid-sized companies still depend on siloed systems: an old WMS here, spreadsheets for transportation, and emails for carrier updates. The result? Disconnected visibility, inefficiency, and rising logistics cost.

SAP Logistics Management (LGM) reimagines this landscape.
Built natively on the SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP), LGM unifies warehousing, transportation, and network collaboration into a single intelligent cloud platform. It brings the power of SAP EWM, SAP TM, and SAP Business Network for Logistics (BN4L) together for the first time in a cloud-native experience.

Solution Overview — Unified, Scalable, and Built for the Cloud

SAP Logistics Management bridges execution gaps by bringing every logistics function into a unified flow: from goods receipt to shipment confirmation, across multiple warehouses, modes, and carriers.

Source: 4577_SAP_Logistics_Management_L2_Public

Key Design Principles

Principle Description
Cloud-nativeSaaS architecture, auto-updates, minimal IT footprint.
Unified logistics layerIntegrates warehouse, transport, and carrier collaboration.
AI-enabledEmbedded Joule AI assistant supports planning and exception handling.
Network-readyPre-integrated with SAP Business Network for Logistics.
Composable & scalableAdopt modules progressively (start small, scale fast).

Functional Scope — From Warehouse to Network

SAP LGM delivers four main functional pillars:

  1. Warehouse Logistics (cloud EWM capabilities)

  2. Transportation Logistics (cloud TM capabilities)

  3. Network Collaboration (integrated with BN4L)

  4. Unified Planning & Control (real-time visibility cockpit)

Each pillar comes with its own set of Fiori apps, use cases, and business value.

Warehouse Logistics — Cloud EWM Simplified

Warehouse Logistics in LGM handles end-to-end inbound, internal, and outbound warehouse operations. Designed for ease of adoption, it provides structured receiving, storage, and dispatch processes with mobile execution and embedded analytics — all running in the cloud.

Category Capabilities Business Benefit

InboundGoods receipt, putaway, inspectionReduce manual errors and waiting time.
InternalBin management, replenishmentOptimize space and movement.
OutboundPicking, packing, staging, loadingFaster fulfillment accuracy.
MobileScanning & task confirmationReal-time execution; paperless workflow.
MonitoringDashboards & alertsImprove supervisory visibility.

Warehouse Monitor App: Imagine a retailer’s regional warehouse receiving 200 SKUs per day. The supervisor uses Warehouse Monitor to see that Putaway Zone B is overloaded while Zone C is idle. Within seconds, tasks are rebalanced to maintain service levels — no need for spreadsheets.

Key Fiori Apps in Warehouse Logistics

App Name Usage
Warehouse MonitorSupervisors track workload, resources, exceptions.
Execute Warehouse TasksOperators perform putaway/picking with handhelds.
Manage Inbound DeliveriesCreate, monitor, and post receipts for inbound deliveries.

Transportation Logistics — Intelligent Freight Orchestration

Transportation Logistics in LGM brings planning, tendering, execution, and freight costing into one intelligent workflow. It eliminates spreadsheet-based planning and manual RFQs by integrating real-time carrier collaboration.

Category Capabilities Business Benefit
PlanningLoad building, route optimisation & consolidationCut freight costs and carbon footprint.
TenderingPeer-to-peer / broadcast to carriersAutomate carrier selection.
ExecutionFreight order tracking & event managementAchieve end-to-end visibility.
CostingFreight cost calculation & invoice reconciliationImprove financial accuracy.
AppointmentDock scheduling & time windowsReduce waiting time and idle assets.

Manage Freight RFQs App: A chemical manufacturer planning an urgent dispatch to Delhi creates an RFQ in LGM. Three carriers receive tenders instantly via BN4L; within minutes, Carrier A accepts with best price and lead time — no emails or phone calls needed.

Key Fiori Apps in Transportation Logistics

App Name Usage
Manage Freight RFQsCreate/manage carrier RFQs.
Tender Freight OrdersPublish freight offers to carriers.
Track Freight OrdersView live shipment events & status.

Network Collaboration — Connected by Design

Network Collaboration within SAP LGM links shippers and carriers digitally via the SAP Business Network for Logistics. It replaces emails and calls with structured collaboration — carrier tenders, dock appointments, shipment events, and POD uploads all happen in one network workspace.

Category Capabilities Business Benefit
Carrier CollaborationTender acceptance / status updatesFaster onboarding, less manual follow-up.
Appointment SchedulingDock slot managementSmoother inbound/outbound flow.
Tracking & EventsMilestones & delay alertsPredictive visibility.
DocumentationProof of Delivery / Freight invoice sharingPaperless compliance.

Manage Carrier Collaboration App: A transport partner accepts a freight order from the shipper and uploads the signed POD once delivery is complete. The system automatically updates LGM and triggers freight invoice posting in ERP.

Key Fiori Apps in Network Collaboration

App Name Usage
Manage Carrier CollaborationDigital tender acceptance & status updates.
Schedule Dock AppointmentsDock slot coordination with carriers.
Monitor Shipment MilestonesTrack shipment events and POD status.

Unified Planning & Control — Visibility in One View

Narrative
The Unified Planning & Control cockpit serves as the command centre for logistics execution. It integrates data from warehousing, transportation, and network collaboration into one consolidated dashboard, allowing real-time monitoring and decision-making.

Feature Description
Unified Planning ConsoleAggregate view of all logistics plans & statuses.
Control TowerMonitors execution progress and exceptions.
KPI DashboardsVisualises service levels and throughput.
Exception HandlingGuided workflows to resolve delays and errors.

Logistics Dashboard App: A distribution manager opens the dashboard each morning to view all facilities on one screen. If a lane’s OTD drops below 95 %, he drills into that carrier and sends an RFQ for replacement service — action taken within minutes, not days.

Key Fiori Apps in Unified Planning & Control

App Name Usage
Logistics DashboardKPI overview of logistics network.
Exception Management HubCentralised issue tracking & resolution.
Dashboard for PlanningCompare planned vs actual performance.

Integration — Seamless by Default

LGM connects to SAP Cloud ERP and SAP Business Network using standard APIs and content packages. Data flows bi-directionally for deliveries, goods movements, freight costs and invoices. This ensures a single source of truth across finance and operations.

Intelligence Layer — Joule AI for Smarter Decisions

Joule, SAP’s AI copilot, is built into LGM. It understands context, answers in natural language, and automates common decisions like carrier selection or route replanning.

Source: 4577_SAP_Logistics_Management_L2_Public

A planner types, “Which deliveries are at risk today?” Joule returns a list of orders facing delays and suggests rescheduling or alternate carriers based on historic performance. The planner approves in one click — no manual analysis

Business Benefits — Tangible Value for Growing Companies

Area Impact
SpeedGuided cloud deployment reduces implementation time by 50 %.
VisibilityUnified planning console gives end-to-end control.
EfficiencyAI and automation reduce manual coordination effort.
ScalabilityStart with one site or process, expand as needed.
Continuous InnovationQuarterly updates add new features without upgrades.

entry.title: SAP Business AI概况介绍
entry.content:
如果您对BTP感兴趣，BTP个人精选内容目录 | SAP Blogs 可能有更多你需要的内容

 

SAP Business AI是什么，它从何而来？

SAP Business AI是SAP推出的企业级人工智能平台，基于SAP BTP构建，它在SAP产品矩阵中定位为企业智能化转型的"大脑",专门为企业提供开箱即用的AI能力和智能应用。

就像给企业装上了"智能助手"一样，SAP Business AI让机器能够理解业务、预测趋势、自动化流程，让企业从"数据驱动"真正升级到"智能驱动"

 

SAP开发Business AI的目的是什么？

1. 提供最新最强大的AI能力：

过去企业要实现AI应用需要大量的技术投入和专业人才，而AI技术的发展日新月异，从机器学习到生成式AI，技术门槛很高。SAP将这些技术封装成易于使用的服务和应用，让企业无需深度的AI专业知识就能享受AI带来的业务价值。

2. 最大化SAP应用的价值：

随着AI技术的突破性发展，传统的业务流程已经无法释放利用企业数据的价值。SAP Business AI通过与SAP应用的深度集成，能够将AI能力无缝嵌入到日常业务流程中，就像给传统工厂装上了"智能大脑"，让企业在保持现有业务连续性的同时，获得AI驱动的智能化升级

 

 

SAP Business AI由什么组成，可以用来干什么？

在使用上，SAP Business AI主要有两类用法，分别是标准AI和定制AI

标准AI代表了预置在各个SAP业务应用中的：

  • Joule对话助手，通过自然语言即可查询数据，获取预测，导航页面，甚至是执行业务操作
  • 嵌入式AI功能点，只需要在业务应用中激活即可使用，SAP负责管理背后的业务逻辑和AI模型对接

定制AI则包含:

  • Joule Studio，用于增强标准Joule功能，可以为标准Joule添加记忆，添加能力例如访问外部数据库，访问外部接口执行操作等
  • Gen AI Hub，可以提供20+主流LLM的接入，无需与供应商绑定
  • AI Core：管理LLM和提示词
  • Intelligent Scenario Lifecycle Management(ISLM)：统一管理S/4HANA对模型的接入
  • Document AI: 可以从PDF/图片等不规则信息来源中提取结构化数据

典型组合工作场景： 想象一个制造企业处理客户投诉。AI Services自动分析投诉邮件内容和附件，预测分析判断问题严重程度，智能自动化触发相应的处理流程，生成式AI帮助客服人员起草个性化回复，整个过程就像有了一个"超级客服团队"在24小时工作 。

 

 

SAP Business AI和市面上常见的类似产品有什么区别？

1. 更加针对业务的AI服务设计：

与通用AI平台不同，Business AI的服务都是针对具体业务场景设计的。大部分AI服务都包含开箱即用的预定义内容，比如预构建的行业AI模型、业务流程优化算法、智能分析模板等，让企业能够快速启动AI项目

2. 基于BTP的平台效应：

Business AI充分利用SAP BTP的统一身份认证、数据管理、集成能力等平台服务，AI模型可以通过数据能力直接访问企业数据，AI洞察可以通过集成能力触发业务流程，形成完整的智能化业务闭环

3. 与SAP生态的完美结合：

Business AI深度集成了SAP应用的业务逻辑和数据模型。例如，嵌入式AI模型可以直接理解S/4HANA的业务对象，智能应用可以无缝嵌入SAP Fiori界面，对话式AI可以直接操作SAP系统功能，就像为SAP系统量身定制的"智能大脑"

 

 

SAP Business AI该怎么用呢？

对于不同AI成熟度的企业，Business AI的应用重点各有不同：

AI起步阶段的企业： 可以从预构建的智能应用开始，比如使用文档AI自动处理发票和合同，或使用预测分析优化库存管理，快速体验AI带来的效率提升。

AI探索阶段的企业： 可以重点利用AI Services和生成式AI能力，构建智能客服、内容生成、数据分析等应用，将AI能力逐步融入到核心业务流程中。

AI成熟阶段的企业： 可以充分利用Business AI的高级能力：

通过AI Core构建定制化的机器学习模型，实现精准的业务预测和优化

利用生成式AI和RAG技术，创建企业知识助手和智能决策支持系统

在复杂的业务场景中实现端到端的智能自动化，让AI成为业务创新的核心驱动力（而不是简单的效率工具）

entry.title: Leveraging Web Client Procedures for Use of LLMs within HDLRE
entry.content:
Large Language Models (LLMs) are revolutionizing data management systems with their advanced semantic understanding and exceptional generalization capabilities. In this article we will explain how to leverage existing web client procedure support in SAP HANA Cloud, data lake Relational Engine (HDLRE) to integrate LLMs. With this feature, customers can now harness the power of LLMs for enhanced database management and analytics. 

 SAP AI Core, a service within the SAP Business Technology Platform, is designed to manage the execution and operations of AI assets in a standardized and scalable manner. While this article primarily focuses on SAP AI Core as the LLM service, please note that the feature is highly adaptable and can be integrated with any LLM service that best meets your requirements. 

 To deploy an LLM model within SAP AI Core, follow the instructions provided at initial setup for SAP AI core service to enable the service, generate a service key, and obtain an access token. Subsequently, you can deploy a language model, such as GPT-5 or Cloud Sonnet 4, and retrieve the deployment URL. Detailed instructions for this process are available at create deployment for generative AI model in SAP AI core.  

 In HDLRE, you can create a user-defined web client procedure to make HTTP requests to an HTTP server. This procedure will be used to invoke LLM services. For a more detailed explanation, please refer to the documentation to create a procedure (web service).  

 In our example, we have developed a web client procedure named AIPOST to make AI API calls. Ensure that the API version is specified according to the relevant AI API documentation. 

CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE AIPOST ( 

    data LONG VARCHAR 

) 

RESULT(c1 long varchar, c2 long varchar)  

URL ‘$YOUR_DEPLOYMENT_URL/chat/completions?$API_VERSION' 

TYPE 'HTTP:POST:application/json' 

HEADER 'Authorization:Bearer $YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN' 

SET 'HTTP(VERSION=1.1)';

To call the procedure for an introduction to SAP HDLRE, use the following example: 

CALL AIPOST('{ "messages": [ { "role": "user", "content": "What is SAP HDLRE" } ] }');

 Building on this, more advanced and practical stored procedures can be developed to leverage LLMs effectively. For instance, if we have an expense table, with some potentially suspicious round numbers( for testing),   we can employ AI to detect any irregular data patterns that may indicate potential fraud. In this procedure, we will gather all data from the expense table and submit it, along with a query, to the LLM service. 

Please be advised that the stored procedure sp_parse_json will be available in HDLRE version QRC4/2025. 

CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE ask_ai_fraud_detection( 

    IN user_question LONG VARCHAR 

) 

BEGIN 

    DECLARE _payload LONG VARCHAR; 

    DECLARE @expense_data LONG VARCHAR DEFAULT ''; 

    DECLARE _response LONG VARCHAR; 

    DECLARE @clean_question LONG VARCHAR; 

     

    IF user_question LIKE '%detection%' OR user_question LIKE '%fraud%' THEN 

        IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SYSTABLE WHERE table_name = 'expense' AND table_type = 'BASE') THEN 

            SELECT 'All Expense Records: ' +  

                   LIST('ID:' + CAST(ISNULL(expense_id, 0) AS VARCHAR) +  

                        '|Desc:' + ISNULL(expense_description, 'N/A') +  

                        '|Amount:' + CAST(ISNULL(amount, 0) AS VARCHAR) +  

                        '|Date:' + CAST(ISNULL(expense_date, TODAY()) AS VARCHAR) +  

                        '|Category:' + ISNULL(category, 'N/A'),  

                        ' || ') 

            INTO @expense_data 

            FROM ( 

                SELECT expense_id, expense_description, amount, expense_date, category 

                FROM expense 

                ORDER BY expense_date DESC 

            ) AS recent_expenses; 

        ELSE 

            SET @expense_data = 'Expense table not found in database'; 

        END IF; 

    END IF; 

    

    -- Clean the user question for JSON (escape quotes and newlines) 

    SET @clean_question = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE( 

        user_question + ' [Database Context: ' + @expense_data + ']', 

        '"', '\\"'), CHAR(10), '\\n'), CHAR(13), '\\r'), CHAR(9), '\\t'); 

     

    -- Build complete JSON payload directly 

    SET _payload = '{"messages":[{"role":"user","content":"' + @clean_question + '"}]}'; 

     

    SELECT c2 INTO _response 

    FROM (AIPOST(@json_payload)) 

    WHERE c1 LIKE '%Body%'; 

   

   -- Parse the JSON and extract the content 

   CALL sp_parse_json('ai_parsed', _response); 

 

   -- Display the response 
   SELECT ai_parsed.choices[[1]].[message].[content]; 

END; 

 

call ask_ai_fraud_detection('Can you detect any fraud in the expenses table, apply Benford law if needed');

Once the response is parsed from its JSON format, we obtain the analysis from the LLM service. Initially, it explains Benford’s law, and then identifies the dataset as suspicious, and offers recommendations. 

Here is another example of leveraging AI to redact sensitive personal data and generate an alternative treatment plan for patients. Similar to the previous example, this stored procedure retrieves data from the patient_records table and sends it to the LLM service. 

CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE ask_ai_redact( 

    IN user_question LONG VARCHAR 

) 

BEGIN 

    DECLARE _payload LONG VARCHAR; 

    DECLARE _data LONG VARCHAR DEFAULT ''; 

    DECLARE _response LONG VARCHAR; 

    DECLARE @clean_question LONG VARCHAR; 

     

    -- Get medical data from the specified table 

    IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SYSTABLE WHERE table_name = 'patient_records' AND table_type = 'BASE') THEN 

        -- Build medical data string with all patient information 

       SELECT 'Medical Records Data: ' +  

       LIST('Record_' + CAST(record_id AS VARCHAR) +  

            '|Name:' + ISNULL(patient_name, 'Unknown') +  

            '|DOB:' + ISNULL(CAST(birth_date AS VARCHAR), 'Unknown') +  

            '|Gender:' + ISNULL(gender, 'Unknown') +  

            '|Phone:' + ISNULL(phone_number, 'Unknown') +  

            '|Email:' + ISNULL(email_address, 'Unknown') +  

            '|Address:' + ISNULL(street_address, '') + ', ' + ISNULL(city_name, '') + ', ' + ISNULL(province_code, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(postal_code, '') + 

            '|SIN:' + ISNULL(sin, 'Unknown') +  

            '|OHIP:' + ISNULL(ohip_number, 'Unknown') +  

            '|Diagnosis:' + ISNULL(CAST(diagnosis_description AS VARCHAR(100)), 'Unknown') + 

            '|Treatment:' + ISNULL(CAST(treatment_notes AS VARCHAR(100)), 'Unknown') +  

            '|Doctor:' + ISNULL(doctor_name, 'Unknown') +  

            '|VisitDate:' + ISNULL(CAST(visit_date AS VARCHAR), 'Unknown') + 

            ' || ') 

        INTO _data 

        FROM ( 

            SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY record_id 

        ) AS sample_records; 

    ELSE 

        SET _data = 'No medical records table found'; 

    END IF; 

     

    -- Clean the user question for JSON (escape quotes and newlines) 

    SET @clean_question = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE( 

        user_question + ' [Database Context: ' + _data + ']', 

        '"', '\\"'), CHAR(10), '\\n'), CHAR(13), '\\r'), CHAR(9), '\\t'); 

     

    -- Build complete JSON payload directly 

    SET _payload = '{"messages":[{"role":"user","content":"' + @clean_question + '"}]}'; 

     

    SELECT c2 INTO _response 

    FROM (AIPOST(@json_payload)) 

    WHERE c1 LIKE '%Body%'; 

     

    -- Parse the JSON and extract the content  

   CALL sp_parse_json('ai_parsed', _response); 

 

   -- Display the response 
   SELECT ai_parsed.choices[[1]].[message].[content]; 
 

END; 

 

call ask_ai_redact('Replace sensitive personal data with placeholder values like [REDACTED_NAME]. Return the redacted data in the same format. Also provide an alternative treatment plan for each patient.');

The response confirms that all sensitive data has been redacted, and a recommended treatment plan is provided. 

Additionally, we can develop auxiliary stored procedures to simulate context windows, preserving chat history like chat-based AI models like ChatGPT. We can also create procedures that leverage LLMs for data usage predictions, schema analysis, and more. This feature allows us to fully capitalize on the immense potential of both the database and the LLMs. We hope you find this feature valuable and enjoy the numerous opportunities it brings for enhanced database management and analytics!

entry.title: SAP集成套件中的Cloud Integration云集成功能概况介绍
entry.content:
如果您对BTP感兴趣，BTP个人精选内容目录 | SAP Blogs 可能有更多你需要的内容

 

想象一下这样的场景：

上午9点，销售团队在CRM中录入了一笔新订单，但仓库管理系统毫不知情，依然显示库存充足...

下午2点，财务系统已经生成了发票，但物流系统还在等待发货指令，订单处理陷入停滞...

晚上加班，IT部门又在为两个系统间的数据不一致问题而焦头烂额...

如果您的企业正被"系统各自为政"的问题困扰，SAP集成套件的云集成功能就是专为解决系统间沟通障碍而设计的解决方案。

 

Cloud Integration云集成是什么？

是SAP集成套件的核心组成部分，云集成功能扮演着核心执行引擎的角色，负责实际的消息处理和数据传输工作，确保信息在不同系统间安全高效地流动 。

 

 

SAP开发云集成功能的目的是什么？

战略层面：赋予集成套件集成不同接口协议，不同数据格式，不同网络环境应用的能力，是集成套件的核心功能

功能层面：它与SAP集成套件的其他功能协同工作，如Integration Advisor提供B2B集成场景中的字段映射建议，Trading Partner Management 管理需要集成的大量业务伙伴，API Management提供安全的API访问，最后由云集成功能执行具体的消息转发，形成完整的集成解决方案 。

 

 

云集成可以用来干什么？

云集成就像企业的"数字神经网络"，实际连接各个业务系统，以最简单的从A系统同步消息到B系统的场景举例：

1.接口对接：

云集成支持所有主流接口，无论A/B系统使用的是常见的HTTP/Odata协议，还是SAP专用的RFC协议，云集成都能对接上，也就是说A或B系统可以均为非SAP系统；

云集成还内置连接器，集成特定应用时可以节约工作量（A或B为特定应用时）;

针对特定的集成场景（A,B，集成场景均特定时）提供开箱即用的预定义内容，填写系统网址即可部署

2. 低代码开发的消息内容修改，格式转换：

在从A获取到数据，发送至B之前，云集成支持以低代码的方式开发数据加工流程，只需要拖拉拽所需工件，组成流程，就可以将从A获取的数据进行一系列按顺序的修改，例如从XML转换为JSON；加密/解密；从S/4HANA格式映射为其他应用格式。除了基本的顺序处理之外，还支持逻辑路由、分割器等高级消息处理功能。

3.监控

开发完成的集成流在部署，执行工作之后，会产生日志记录，会展现从A接收到消息/处理消息/将消息发送给B过程中每一步处理的结果，并且在遇到报错时高亮报错的具体点位

 

 

云集成功能与市面上类似功能有什么区别？

1. 丰富的预构建集成内容

SAP提供大量现成的集成流、API和连接器，特别是针对SAP产品的深度集成内容。这就像拥有一个专业的"集成模板库"，大部分常见场景都有现成的解决方案，而不需要从零开始开发。

2. 基于BTP的平台优势

作为SAP业务技术平台的原生服务，云集成功能享受平台级的安全、监控和治理能力。这就像住在一个配套完善的智能社区，所有基础设施都是现成的，都不需要自己搭建。

3. 与SAP生态的完美结合

  • 深度集成：与SAP S/4HANA、SuccessFactors等SAP产品无缝集成
  • 统一体验：共享SAP的设计语言和操作习惯
  • 自动更新：SAP负责预构建内容的维护和更新

相比其他集成平台需要大量定制开发，SAP云集成功能提供了"开箱即用"的SAP生态集成能力，特别适合以SAP为核心的企业IT环境。

 

 

云集成功能该怎么落地使用呢？

使用云集成功能就像搭建企业的"数字高速公路"，主要步骤包括：

1. 获取，并配置环境，分配权限

2. 设计集成流程

  • 调研数据源提供的数据格式，和数据目的地可以接收的数据格式
  • 设计消息处理，和消息映射逻辑，确定字段的业务含义

3. 配置接口，以及数据的转换过程

  • 选择合适的协议来连接数据源和数据目的地
  • 配置消息转换、路由、映射和安全设置

4. 部署和监控

  • 将集成流部署到运行时环境
  • 使用内置监控仪表板跟踪消息流和性能

整个过程采用低代码方式，通过图形化界面就能完成复杂的集成设计，大大降低了技术门槛

entry.title: SAP业务数据云中的SAP Analytics Cloud分析云概况介绍
entry.content:
如果您对BTP感兴趣，BTP个人精选内容目录 | SAP Blogs 可能有更多你需要的内容

 

 

SAP Analytics Cloud是什么？

SAP Analytics Cloud分析云是SAP业务数据云(Business Data Cloud, 即BDC)的核心分析组件，扮演着企业"数据大脑"的角色。它将BI、预测和Planning功能统一在一个云平台中，就像为企业配备了一位既能看懂历史、又能预测未来、还能制定计划的智能顾问。

 

 

SAP开发分析云的目的是什么？

解决企业面临的决策滞后挑战。传统企业的数据只能以原始数据的方式呈现，管理者难以获得全局视角进行快速决策，但借助BDC中的分析云功能就可以通过丰富的图表来更直观的了解企业的量化现状，了解过去，甚至是预测未来

 

 

Analytics Cloud可以用来干什么？

Analytics Cloud就像企业的"智能决策中心"，提供三大核心能力：

1. BI分析

自助式报表创建：业务用户可以像制作PPT一样拖拽创建专业的数据可视化界面

移动端访问：高管在出差途中也能通过手机查看关键业务指标

2. 预测分析

智能预测：基于历史销售数据预测下季度收入趋势

异常检测：自动识别费用支出中的异常模式

机器学习集成：无需数据科学背景即可应用AI算法

3. 企业计划

协作式预算编制：各部门可以同时在线编制和调整预算计划

情景模拟：快速模拟"如果销量增长20%"对整体业绩的影响

版本管理：自动跟踪预算修改历史和审批流程

 

 

Analytics Cloud和市面上常见分析工具有什么区别？

1. 三合一集成能力

传统方案需要分别购买BI工具、预测软件和规划系统，Analytics Cloud将三者统一，就像买了一台既能打电话、又能上网、还能拍照的智能手机，而不是分别买三个设备。

2. 平台优势

享受BTP技术平台企业级的安全、合规和治理能力，数据处理符合GDPR等法规要求，就像住在有专业物业管理的高端社区，安全和服务都有保障；同时原生和BDC内的其他数据集成，数据存储，数据建模工具集成，可以一站式的解决所有数据需求

3. 与SAP生态的完美结合

原生集成：与SAP系统通过配置即可连接，数据实时同步

统一体验：延续SAP Fiori设计风格，用户学习成本低

内容丰富：提供行业最佳实践模板和预构建分析内容

 

 

Analytics Cloud该怎么用呢？

使用Analytics Cloud就像为企业搭建"智能驾驶舱"，主要步骤包括：

1. 环境准备，账户权限配置，数据集成

2. 数据建模，KPI指标设计

3. 创建分析内容，低代码拖拉拽即可生成报表内容

4. 协作和分享，在企业内分享内容，获取反馈

Datasphere是什么？

SAP Datasphere是SAP业务数据云(Business Data Cloud,即BDC)的核心数据建模与数据集成组件，扮演着企业"数据中心"的角色。它将数据集成、数据建模、业务建模和数据治理功能统一在一个云平台中，负责连接、整合和建模来自SAP和非SAP系统的数据，确保数据在不同系统间安全高效地流动并保持业务语义。

 

SAP开发Datasphere的目的是什么？

解决现代企业面临的数据孤岛和混合IT环境挑战。如何让企业异构系统的数据无缝协作，同时保持SAP数据的业务语义，成为关键问题。

Datasphere与SAP BTP生态系统的其他功能协同工作：SAP HANA Cloud提供湖仓一体的数据存储能力，SAP Analytics Cloud实现数据消费与展现，与SAP Databricks相互调用模型/数据，并与S/4HANA等业务系统深度集成，形成完整的企业数据和分析解决方案。

 

 

Datasphere可以用来干什么？

Datasphere就像企业的"数据统一平台"，连接并保存各个业务系统的数据, 以最典型的数据集成和建模场景举例：

1. 数据连接与集成

支持所有主流数据源连接，无论是SAP系统（S/4HANA、BW等）还是非SAP系统，都能无缝对接

内置预构建连接器，针对特定应用可以节约集成工作量

提供开箱即用的业务内容包，填写系统信息即可快速部署

2. 低代码数据建模和转换

支持图形化拖拽方式创建数据模型和转换流程，业务用户也能轻松操作

提供强大的SQL编辑器满足复杂建模需求

支持数据虚拟化、复制和转换等多种数据处理模式

3. 业务语义建模

保持SAP系统的业务语义和上下文，让数据更有意义

支持多维分析建模，内置数据预览功能

提供数据治理和目录功能，确保数据质量和可发现性

 

 

Datasphere和市面上常见的数据平台有什么区别？

1. 统一业务语义层的独特优势

这个平台结合BDC内各个组件，将数据集成、建模、治理和消费能力整合在一起。这就像拥有一个"数据管理的瑞士军刀"，而不需要购买多个独立的数据工具。

2. 基于BTP的平台优势

Datasphere享受BTP平台整体的安全、监控和治理能力。这就像住在一个配套完善的智能社区，所有基础设施都是现成的，无需自己搭建。

3. 与SAP生态的完美结合

深度集成：与SAP S/4HANA、SuccessFactors等SAP产品原生集成，保持业务语义

统一体验：共享SAP Fiori设计语言和操作习惯

预构建内容：提供丰富的SAP业务内容包和最佳实践模板

相比其他数据平台在获取到数据后需要完成的复杂业务语义重建工作，Datasphere为SAP客户提供了"即插即用"的数据管理能力，特别适合以SAP为核心的企业IT环境。

 

 

Datasphere该怎么用呢？

使用Datasphere就像为企业搭建"智能数据中枢"，主要步骤包括：

1. 获取，配置环境，分配权限

2. 建立数据表和对应的数据集成管道

  • 可以无缝对接SAP私有云系统，公有云系统
  • 还可以通过低代码开发对接各种非SAP数据
  • 甚至可以通过零拷贝的方式使用对象存储技术的数据源，无需真正导入数据，即可开始建模，消费

3. 数据建模和转换

  • 利用低代码工具创建数据模型和业务视图
  • 配置数据转换逻辑和业务规则

4. 部署和消费

  • 将数据模型部署到生产环境
  • 通过SAP Analytics Cloud或其他工具消费模型计算后的数据进行分析
  • 整个过程采用自助式操作，业务用户通过直观的界面就能完成专业的数据管理工作，大大降低了技术门槛，让每个业务专家都能成为数据建模者。

entry.title: Building Bridges Between SAP and Databricks: A Dream Team for Your Data and AI-Powered Analytics
entry.content:
The Interplay of SAP & Databricks: Why Now?

The combination of SAP and Databricks is more than just a technical integration; it is a strategic course-setting. It brings together the best of two worlds:

  • SAP as a Stable Foundation: Your SAP systems contain the most important business data—from financial key figures to master data. This data is not only comprehensive but also semantic and contextual, making it an ideal basis for training AI models.
  • Databricks as an Innovation Engine: Databricks offers a scalable platform for Data, Analytics, and AI. It is a powerful engine for machine learning and complex analyses, enabling companies to gain valuable insights from large amounts of data.

This Dream Team transforms corporate management. Instead of merely answering questions like "What happened?", Business AI enables a look into the future: "Why did it happen?" and, most importantly, "What will happen and what should we do?".

Figure 1: Interplay of SAP & Databricks

 

The Benefits of Integration at a Glance

The partnership between SAP and Databricks offers tangible benefits that are evident at the strategic, technical, and operational levels.

Strategic Advantages

The integration ensures open data management and analytics for SAP and non-SAP data. Complete alignment with the SAP Business Data Cloud with strong governance creates a future-proof architecture. The simplified pricing model in general Capacity Units also makes the start easier to plan.

Technical Advantages

The platform is designed to allow extended use via interfaces and can scale with growing demands and data volumes. The seamless integration of the SAP Business Warehouse and SAP S/4HANA with data products enables an end-to-end process. An important difference when deciding for or against an SAP Databricks: The SAP Databricks is fully managed by SAP. This means it is technically operational immediately.

Operational Advantages

Companies benefit from a Hyperscaler infrastructure, which ensures resilience and a reduction in Total Cost of Ownership (TCO). Technical operation is supported by Managed Services from SAP, which reduces complexity in day-to-day business and allows for the installation of upgrades on demand.

How the Dream Team Works in Practice

Databricks offers a number of key elements to enable integration and analysis:

  • Unity Catalog: The Unity Catalog serves as a central landing zone for governance and data products. Metadata is managed here and the data is stored in Delta Tables, ensuring a consistent view of your information and secure access.

Figure 2: Databricks Unity Catalog: The landing zone for governance and data products.

  • Databricks Workspace: Modeling and development take place in the Databricks Workspace. Users work here with interactive notebooks, which offer an encapsulated programming interface for agile and flexible work. SQL, Python, R, and Scala are supported as languages.

Figure 3: Databricks Workspace: Modeling takes place in Databricks within the Workspace, using "Notebooks" among other tools.

  • Databricks Machine Learning: The integration of MLflow enables the training, versioning, and deployment of models. The clear management of training runs and the linking of datasets significantly simplifies the establishment of professional AI in the company. Important to know: The operation of Machine Learning models should strategically take place in SAP AI Core, although Databricks also supports this functionality depending on the use case.

Figure 4: Databricks Machine Learning. Model training (experiments), model versioning, or the deployment of models on one platform.

Conclusion: From Dataset to Smart Decision

The combination of SAP and Databricks elevates data analysis to a new level. Your financial key figures and master data serve as a reliable source for intelligent analyses. The integration with Databricks makes it possible to automatically recognize patterns and correlations from this data. The platform's flexibility and scalability allow complex AI models to be applied and the resulting cluster information seamlessly fed back into your SAP world to enable users to make well-founded decisions. The deep and exclusive technical integration of both worlds guarantees a secure and fast exchange of data products.

Key Takeaways for Your Company

  • Data and AI are moving closer together: The separation between data storage (SAP) and data analysis (Databricks) is a thing of the past. The seamless integration allows your most valuable business data to be used directly for modern AI applications. This creates a unified information base and eliminates fragmented data silos.
  • High Potential through Synergies: The combination of SAP’s standardized data storage and proven processes with Databricks’ innovative AI technology opens up completely new possibilities. You can not only see what happened but also why it happened and what will happen next. This empowers you to act proactively and identify risks early on.
  • Professional AI Establishment: The Databricks platform offers a mature environment for professionally establishing AI applications in the company. Thanks to functions like Unity Catalog for data governance and Databricks Machine Learning for model training, you can ensure that your AI initiatives are scalable, secure, and sustainable.

How You Can Get Started Now: Our Practical Advice

Many companies hesitate to take the first step because the topic seems complex. However, getting started doesn't have to be overwhelming. We recommend starting with a Proof-of-Concept (PoC).

  • Define a Clear Use Case: Choose an area in your company where data analysis can bring real added value. This could be optimizing inventory management, predicting customer behavior, or automating financial forecasts.
  • Utilize Your Existing Potential: A PoC helps you assess how you can tap into your unused data potential. This provides concrete results and allows you to prove the business case for a broader implementation.
  • Start Small to Grow Big: Begin with a manageable project to achieve quick successes and build confidence in the new technology. The scalability of the platform allows you to easily add more use cases later.

The partnership between SAP and Databricks is not a futuristic concept but a practice-oriented solution that helps you make data-driven decisions and future-proof your company. The time to awaken your SAP data from its slumber is now.

Now it’s your turn: What experiences have you already had with using SAP data for intelligent analyses? What challenges do you see on the path to Business AI? We look forward to your perspectives and to shaping the future of data analysis together.

你是否曾经历过这样的绝望时刻？

周一早晨，老板说："我需要看一下上个月的销售分析报表，下午开会要用。"

💰 定制开发成本高昂，动辄几十万

为什么这与你息息相关？

SAP业务数据云BDC中的Intelligent Application智能应用是什么？

Intelligent Application是以SaaS形式呈现的一份实时报表，是SAP业务数据云(BDC)中的核心分析组件，扮演着企业"决策助手"的角色。它将预构建的数据管道，数据模型、分析模型和可视化仪表板统一在一个完全托管的SaaS模式的解决方案中，确保企业能够快速获得可行动的Insight 。

 

 

SAP业务数据云BDC中的Data Products数据产品是什么？

是经过策划的、可复用的，业务就绪的数据模型，BDC内提供大量预置Data Products,一方面提供给Intelligent Application使用；一方面也可以基于预置的Data Products自行定制Data Products，同时还可以从零开发Data Products

 

 

SAP开发Intelligent Application的目的是什么？

解决企业获取数据价值成本高，速度慢的挑战。

传统方式下，企业要释放数据价值，需要投入大量资源，核心困难点包括异构数据源的集成工作，数据集成后的清洗工作，大数据量下数据模型的性能问题，数据模型与BI报表的KPI设计问题等

Intelligent Application呈现的开箱即用报表是由BDC中各个组件协同工作达成的：基于SAP Datasphere的数据集成与建模能力，通过SAP Analytics Cloud提供可视化展现，并与S/4HANA等业务系统深度集成，最后以SaaS形式的报表呈现给用户。

 

 

Intelligent Application可以用来干什么？

1. 自动搭建数据管道

系统自动创建从源系统到分析层的完整数据管道，无需手动配置；数据管道自动执行数据提取、转换和加载工作，同时提供实时增量数据同步，确保报表持续基于最新业务数据

2.自动搭建数据模型

系统自动基于预置的Data Products将业务应用集成过来的数据建立数据模型

3. 自动搭建并呈现报表

这里的报表是基于行业最佳实践设计的，包含大量分析模型和KPI指标，同时支持跨业务线的综合分析，如财务、销售、采购等领域的统一视图

4. 智能洞察和预测

报表还天然集成了AI模型，提供预测性分析和异常检测，同样以报表的形式展现

用户还可以在预置内容的基础上定制化，并结合SAP Databricks的增强分析能力

Intelligent Application和市面上常见的分析解决方案有什么区别？

1. 完全托管的端到端解决方案：

SAP提供从数据集成到可视化展现的完整解决方案，由行业专家预先构建和维护，一键即可获取实时报表

2. 基于BTP的平台优势：

作为SAP业务技术平台的原生服务，智能应用享受平台级的安全、监控和治理能力。这就像住在配套完善的智能社区，所有基础设施都由专业团队管理维护

3. 与SAP生态的完美结合

  • 深度集成：与SAP产品原生集成，保持原始数据不丢失，业务语义不错乱
  • 统一体验：共享SAP Fiori设计语言和操作习惯

相比其他分析平台需要大量定制开发和维护工作，智能应用为SAP客户提供了"开箱即用"的分析能力，特别适合希望快速获得业务价值的企业环境

entry.title: SAP Build Work Zone in Integrated Product Development: A Step-by-Step Setup Guide
entry.content:
Why SAP Build Work Zone for IPD?

In complex IPD environments, teams work with various applications, from CAD systems to PLM tools and collaboration platforms. SAP Build Work Zone, Standard Edition provides a central access point for all enterprise applications and reduces complexity for end users. The platform enables the creation of role-based, personalized business sites with flexible content structures.

Prerequisites

Before starting the setup, ensure the following prerequisites are met:

  • SAP BTP Subaccount: An active SAP Business Technology Platform subaccount with appropriate permissions
  • Administrator Rights: Subaccount administrator or corresponding roles for configuration
  • SAP Cloud Identity Services: Access to Identity Authentication Services (IAS) for user management

Step-by-Step Setup Guide

1. Start Booster for SAP Build Work Zone

Navigate to the "Boosters" section in your SAP BTP Cockpit and search for "SAP Build Work Zone". The booster automates the basic configuration steps for your subaccount.

2. Select Subaccount

Choose the appropriate subaccount where SAP Build Work Zone, Standard Edition should be set up.

3. Start your application "SAP Build Work Zone, Standard Edition"

4. Create and Name Website

5. Link Launchpad_Admin Role with Identity Services

For role management, navigate in the cockpit side panel to:

  • Security → Trust Configuration
  • Click on the tenant you created in SAP Cloud Identity Services

  • A screen opens on the right side - click on the "Attribute Mappings" tab and then "Edit"

  • Under the "Role Collection" column, select the Launchpad_Admin role from the dropdown list

  • Enter "Groups" as attribute and "Admin" as value. Click "+" to add the attributes and save

The mapping is complete. You can now access SAP Build Work Zone, Standard Edition.

Create a Site

When you create a site, you'll be redirected to the Site Studio Site Settings screen. By enabling "Spaces and Pages – New Experience" view mode, you can create spaces and pages locally in dedicated editors.

  • Click "Edit" in the upper right corner of the Site Settings screen
  • Under "Display" select "Spaces and Pages - New Experience"

  • Go to Site Directory to view the site tile

Your site is empty.

General Process

The general process is structured in the following steps: Apps → Pages → Spaces → Roles → Users

Configure Apps

Click the Content Manager icon in the side panel to open the Content Manager. You'll see a list of content elements added to your subaccount.

  • Go to Content Explorer and select your content
  • Choose the channel for your content

  • Select the channel functionalities and add them to your content

  • After adding functionalities from various applications, add them to your own content

Create Pages

  • Create a page

  • Add a name for the page, description, header, and select relevant widgets

  • Create this for all other necessary applications for IPD

Create Spaces

1. First decide whether one or multiple spaces are necessary

Check your requirements:

  • Do all users have the same access rights?
  • Do you need different security levels?

→ One space with multiple pages is optimal in most cases. Multiple spaces mean exponentially higher administrative complexity.

a) Create one space
Content Manager → Create → Space

  • Add title: e.g., "IPD Workspace", add description
  • Assign pages to space: activate assignment status for all pages
  • Order by priority
  • Save

b) Create multiple spaces
Content Manager → Create → Space:

  • "Collaboration Space"
  • "Specification Management Space"

2. Assign space to Everyone role
Content Manager → Everyone → Edit → Spaces Tab:

  • Activate assignment status for space and save

3. Complete site configuration
Site Directory → Site Settings → Edit:

  • View Mode: "Spaces and Pages - New Experience"
  • Confirm Everyone role

Role Assignments

1. Perform role assignments

a) Use Everyone role when:

  • All users should have access to IPD apps
  • You need a simple, quick solution
  • No differentiated permissions are required

Procedure:

  • Assign apps to Everyone role (activate Assignment Status)
  • Done - no further BTP role assignments needed

b) Create custom IPD role

  • Click Edit in Site Settings

  • In the Assignments area, add your created role ("+" symbol)

Additional Role Information

In addition to the setup steps described above, you can assign predefined roles to users for accessing specific applications within SAP Integrated Product Development. These role templates simplify permission management and ensure that users have access to the right tools and functionalities based on their responsibilities.

For more information, see the official SAP Help documentation: Role Templates for SAP Integrated Product Development .

  • Switch to BTP Cockpit
  • Navigate to Security → Users
  • Select your user
  • Click "Assign Role Collection"
  • Search for your created role and assign it

Conclusion

SAP Build Work Zone, Standard Edition proves to be a central solution for IPD challenges. The systematic implementation - from booster configuration through structured apps, pages, and spaces to thoughtful role management - creates an efficient work environment.

In the next blog, I will detail the integration of SAP Joule into the Work Zone and show how AI-powered functions can further increase productivity in IPD processes.

entry.title: SAP业务数据云中的Data Products数据产品概况介绍
entry.content:
如果您对BTP感兴趣，BTP个人精选内容目录 | SAP Blogs 可能有更多你需要的内容

 

你是否每天都在重复这样的痛苦？

老板要一份客户分析报表，你需要从SAP系统的销售表、客户主数据表、产品表、订单表...几十张表中提取数据，然后手工关联、清洗、整合。花了一周时间做出来，下次汇报如果要再添加指标，业务梳理都要花费大量时间，更不要说技术实现了...

更要命的是，隔壁部门也在做类似的工作，大家各自"造轮子"，数据口径还不一致...

如果有一种方式，让你像使用"数据乐高积木"一样快速搭建分析模型，会怎样？

SAP Data Products就是这样的"数据积木"——预制好的、可复用的数据模型，包含完整业务语义和标准接口。不再需要你从原始数据表开始拼装，直接拿来就用，一次构建，处处复用。

继续阅读，发现数据建模的全新方式。

 

Data Products是什么？

Data Products，是一种可复用的数据模型。是SAP业务数据云(Business Data Cloud, BDC)的核心概念。它不仅仅是原始数据，而是包含了业务上下文、语义和标准化API接口的完整模型。

在BDC中，Data Products扮演着"数据产品化"的关键角色，负责将SAP和非SAP源的数据转换为可直接消费的数据模型

 

SAP开发Data Products的目的是什么？

传统数据集成的痛点

在没有Data Products概念时，企业分析师面临巨大挑战：需要从多个SAP系统的数百张表中手动提取、转换、合并数据，不仅工作量巨大，还容易产生数据不一致和重复劳动的问题。就像每次做菜都要从种菜开始，效率极低且质量难以保证。

Data Products的解决方案

Data Products通过"数据产品化"理念彻底改变这一现状：

  • 标准化封装：将复杂的数据提取逻辑封装成标准化产品，一次构建，多次复用
  • 业务语义保持：保留SAP系统原有的业务上下文，让数据"自带说明书"
  • 开箱即用：提供预构建的业务数据集，分析师可以直接消费而无需关心底层复杂性

在BDC生态中的协同作用

Data Products与BDC其他功能形成完整闭环：通过BDC Cockpit统一管理，与SAP Datasphere集成进行深度建模，通过SAP Analytics Cloud实现可视化分析，与SAP Databricks共享扩展AI/ML能力，构建端到端的企业数据分析解决方案。

 

Data Products可以用来干什么？

Data Products代表了数据模型，而数据模型可以为很多场景服务，例如分析，计划，预测，情景模拟

这里先概括Data Products的三种使用模式

  • 直接使用预置Data Products：适合标准业务场景，开箱即用，快速见效，常用在智能应用中
  • 定制预置Data Products：适合有特殊需求的企业，在标准基础上灵活调整
  • 从零开发自定义Data Products：适合独特业务模式，完全定制化数据产品

目前可用的预置Data Products列表：Link

 

Data Products和市面上类似功能有什么区别？

1. Data Products本身的独特功能优势

  • 业务语义完整性：不仅提供数据，更保持SAP系统原有的业务上下文，如自动关联产品描述、供应商信息、货币单位等
  • 自描述能力：每个Data Product包含完整的接口定义、技术文档和语义关系，实现真正的自服务数据消费

就像购买成品家具而非原材料，既有完整功能又有使用说明书

2. 基于BTP和BDC的平台效应

  • 统一管理体验：通过BDC Cockpit提供单一控制面板，避免在多个工具间切换的复杂性
  • 平台级服务共享：享受SAP BTP的安全、监控、治理等基础设施，无需自建数据管理平台

就像住在配套完善的智能社区，所有基础设施都是现成的

3. 与SAP生态的完美结合

  • 深度集成：与SAP S/4HANA、SuccessFactors等产品原生集成，支持实时数据同步
  • 统一体验：共享SAP Fiori设计语言，为SAP用户提供一致的操作体验
  • 预构建内容：提供针对SAP业务流程优化的数据产品库，实现"即插即用"

就像苹果生态系统，各产品间无缝协作，用户体验一致

相比其他数据平台需要复杂的业务语义重建工作，Data Products为SAP客户提供了"即插即用"的数据管理能力，特别适合以SAP为核心的企业IT环境。

 

Data Products该怎么用呢？

实施步骤概览

1.环境准备,在BDC Cockpit中配置全局账户权限

2.激活数据包：

  • 通过SAP Business Accelerator Hub浏览可用的数据包和数据产品
  • 在BDC Cockpit中激活所需的数据包，使其包含的Data Products在数据目录中可用

3.数据产品安装和共享

  • SAP Datasphere用户可将Data Products权限分配到指定空间用于建模
  • 或通过目录将Data Products共享给SAP Databricks进行AI/ML扩展

4.部署和应用

  • 利用SAP Analytics Cloud创建仪表板和报告，实现数据可视化，或者是通过智能应用一键部署标准分析方案

预期效果

  • 业务用户赋能：业务专家无需复杂的技术技能即可访问和分析企业数据，实现自助式数据消费
  • 开发效率提升：预构建的Data Products和智能应用模板大幅减少数据准备和应用开发时间
  • 数据治理增强：统一的数据产品目录和访问控制确保数据质量和合规性，建立企业级数据信任体系

entry.title: SAP 业务数据云BDC中的SAP Databricks概况介绍
entry.content:
如果您对BTP感兴趣，BTP个人精选内容目录 | SAP Blogs 可能有更多你需要的内容

 

SAP Databricks是什么？

是一个由SAP管理的Databricks特别版，作为BDC的核心组件直接嵌入其中。它利用Apache Spark进行大规模数据处理，无缝集成数据工程、机器学习和商业智能功能，让您能够将来自任何来源的结构化/非结构化/半结构化数据结合使用。

与原生Databricks的主要区别在于：SAP Databricks是一个SAP定制版，SAP管理数据存储，Databricks提供计算资源和计算功能，二者天然集成。

 

 

SAP将Databricks能力纳入BDC中的目的是什么？

为传统数据处理能力做补充，提供大数据处理能力，显著增强BDC的分析能力，为客户提供领先的AI/ML功能。

体现了其对开放数据生态系统的承诺。这种集成实现了BDC和Databricks之间数据产品的无缝、零拷贝、双向共享

在BDC中，SAP Databricks通过行业标准的Delta Share协议工作。BDC中的数据可以被SAP Databricks使用，无需复制到SAP Databricks中。

 

 

SAP Databricks可以用来干什么？

如果没有SAP Databricks, SAP数据都需要复杂的配置才可以接入第三方大数据平台，并且还需要由用户自行保证增量同步，语义不丢失等效果。

SAP Databricks核心功能包括：

  • 人工智能/机器学习：支持完整的机器学习生命周期，从实验到生产，包括生成式AI和大语言模型
  • 数据科学：基于无服务器计算的统一数据科学协作环境，集成IDE和内置可视化工具
  • 数据工程：数据管道、可观测性和监控功能
  • 数据治理：通过SAP Databricks Unity Catalog对结构化和非结构化数据、机器学习模型、笔记本、仪表板和文件进行治理

SAP Databricks核心组件包括：

  • Delta Lake：开放数据湖仓基础
  • Unity Catalog：统一安全、治理和编目
  • Databricks Notebook：数据科学、AI和实时分析
  • Apache Spark：具有并行处理能力的数据处理和分析
  • MLflow：机器学习生命周期管理

数据流向遵循零拷贝共享原则，通过Delta Share协议在SAP BDC和Databricks之间实现双向数据产品共享，无需物理复制数据。

典型使用场景：

  • 自动化预测：使用预置算法构建时间序列预测模型
  • LLM微调：使用您自己的数据微调基础模型，优化性能和效果
  • 探索性数据分析：使用笔记本在多语言工作界面中协作，进行数据科学、可视化、特征工程和ML模型开发

 

 

SAP Databricks和市面上常见的类似功能有什么区别？

在数据获取层面: SAP Databricks可以合规的，零拷贝的，仅配置即可接入SAP数据

在运维管理层面: SAP Databricks结合BDC提供了完整的全套托管数据栈，无需担心不同系统间的身份，安全，协作问题

在成本结构层面：SAP Databricks基于BDC容量单元计费，用户可以灵活选择BDC容量单位的使用方式，可以用在数据集成，存储，建模，以及SAP Databricks等多个方面

 

SAP Databricks该怎么用呢？

实施流程概览

准备阶段：在SAP for Me中即时配置SAP Databricks，自动集成单点登录和安全性

配置步骤：在BDC控制台激活并与SAP Databricks共享运营资金数据产品

数据处理：转换数据产品使其适合ML，使用AutoML进行现金流预测

结果验证：暴露模型服务供应用消费

优化调整：将推理结果共享回SAP Business Data Cloud用于规划和分析用例

entry.title: SAP Business AI中的AI Foundation概况介绍
entry.content:
如果您对BTP感兴趣，BTP个人精选内容目录 | SAP Blogs 可能有更多你需要的内容

 

SAP AI Foundation是什么？

SAP AI Foundation是一个产品集合，由数个搭载于BTP的产品组成，是SAP Business AI的核心组成部分，作为底层AI平台存在。它不是面向最终用户的应用，而是为开发者和技术团队提供构建、部署和管理AI解决方案的完整工具链。

 

 

SAP在Business AI中提供AI Foundation的目的是什么？

战略背景：随着AI技术的快速发展，企业面临着"AI孤岛"问题——各部门独立使用不同的AI工具，缺乏统一管理和协同效应。SAP开发AI Foundation正是为了解决这一痛点

生态支撑作用：AI Foundation就像是一座"AI中台"，为整个SAP Business AI生态系统提供标准化的AI服务。无论是标准化AI范畴的Joule智能助手、嵌入式AI功能，还是定制化AI范畴的Joule定制化和自开发AI应用，都依赖这个平台提供的底层AI能力 。

 

 

SAP AI Foundation可以用来干什么？

没有统一AI平台的挑战：

  • 各部门使用不同AI工具，数据无法共享
  • AI项目重复投资，成本居高不下，能力无法在企业内复用
  • 缺乏统一的安全和合规管理

AI Foundation带来的价值：

  • 提供统一的AI开发和部署环境
  • 实现AI能力的标准化和规模化应用
  • 确保企业级的安全性和合规性
  • 降低AI项目的技术门槛和实施成本

AI Foundation包含四类核心能力：

  • 核心模型管理能力：由AI Core，AI Launchpad，GenAI Hub等产品组成，提供对大语言模型的访问，模型管理，提示词管理等功能
  • 针对AI增强的数据能力：由向量数据库和知识图谱组成，提供业务数据上下文支撑
  • 专业AI服务：由Document AI，Business Entity Recognition等服务组成，提供专项AI能力，比如说非格式化文档的数据提取
  • 定制开发标准AI的能力：由可以定制化Joule的Joule Studio, Joule Agents等服务组成

 

 

SAP AI Foundation和市面上常见的类似功能有什么区别？

产品功能层面的优势

  • 企业级AI治理：与消费级AI工具不同，AI Foundation提供完整的企业级治理框架，包括模型版本管理、性能监控、合规审计等功能，确保AI应用的可靠性和可追溯性
  • 业务上下文理解：AI Foundation中的Document AI等能力基于SAP丰富的业务数据进行训练和优化，能够理解企业特有的业务逻辑和术语，而不是仅仅提供通用的AI能力

平台生态效应

  • 深度集成优势：AI Foundation与SAP BTP&BDC无缝集成，可以直接调用平台上的数据服务、集成服务、分析服务等，形成完整的技术栈，避免了复杂的系统集成工作
  • 云原生架构：采用微服务架构设计，支持弹性扩展和高可用部署，能够根据业务需求自动调整资源配置，确保AI服务的稳定性和性能

SAP应用协同效应

  • 无缝业务集成：AI Foundation的最大优势在于与SAP核心应用的"原生"集成。比如在S/4HANA中使用AI功能时，无需额外的数据同步或接口开发，AI Foundation可以直接获取实时业务数据，又可以将AI能力反向直接嵌入业务应用的流程中
  • 统一用户体验：用户在使用不同SAP应用时，可以享受一致的AI交互体验，学习成本低，使用效率高
  • 数据价值最大化：通过打通SAP产品线的数据壁垒，AI Foundation能够基于企业的完整数据画像提供更精准的AI服务，实现数据价值的最大化利用

 

 

SAP AI Foundation该怎么用呢？

业务需求评估

技术环境准备

核心需求攻关：AI模型选择和训练：根据业务需求选择合适的预训练模型，或基于企业数据进行微调。比如使用SAP Document AI处理发票，或训练客服机器人理解企业特有的业务术语

业务场景集成，用户体验设计和权限设置：将AI能力嵌入到现有的SAP应用中，如S/4HANA、SuccessFactors等。这就像给传统汽车加装智能驾驶系统，让原有系统具备AI能力

测试和优化：通过RAG（检索增强生成）等技术提升AI回答的准确性，确保AI理解企业的业务上下文

持续监控和优化：通过AI Launchpad监控模型性能，根据用户反馈持续优化AI效果

量化价值体现
